title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Amanda Capri Jean Regular
description: STYLE - Classic capri sits at natural waist with usable pockets, zip fly, belt loops and stretch for a perfect fit feeling Everytime
VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops and footwear, a comfortable movement with maximum recovery, ideal for work or play.
LENGTH - This high rise waist capri has a 21 inch inseam from crotch to hem with a 16 inch leg opening
Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile classic look that attracts & connects with modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
